description:
―One day, a man was transported to a different world to a nation that had a firm belief in one religion, and that nation was changed…

One day, Kaneki Ryo was transported to another world’s religious nation, the St. Arnold Empire, and became a citizen of that country.

On the battlefield, he wielded his baton as a commander, and on the front lines, he massacred all the enemy forces with his mysterious power.

When he took time off, he went around the churches of each city, ministering the word of God, which people believed in, and saving the distressed with his adroit eloquence and winning the hearts of many people.

He saved people and was endeared by all, but the truth escaped the people. In his first world, Earth, he was feared as one of the worst criminals in history and was on death row.

And in the second world, he was a dangerous man who taught students at a magic school, but behind the scenes abducted, imprisoned, and tortured many of his students!

What will this overwhelmingly “evil” man encounter in the third world, the country he now resided in, and what will he bring forth? The new series of “Death Row” has begun.>
